text: xallxhˌ phuthrng srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa thrng hı nalng ma cak chan fa læa thrng hı phuch phlng xk ngey xxk ma dwy man (cak na) pheux pen paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea læa thrng hı reux dein smuthr mi khwam sadwk kæ phwk than pheux chı læn tam nanna doy phra baycha khxng phraxngkh læa thrng hı lana thanghlay pen prayochn kæ phwk cea
